Escape

D'Dario

Lyrics: D'Dario

Vocals: D'Dario

Music: D'Dario

Arrangement: D'Dario

Mix/Master: D'Dario

Lyrics:

Intro.

Do you know that feeling

Of wanting to escape

From all the noise around

When it's too much to handle

And you can't take it anymore

The moment when you wanna escape from it all

Chorus.

And even when my life's a mess

Music takes me to another place

No matter how bad it gets

Music is my way to escape

Give me Music, oh...


Verse 1.

Before there was only silence in my head

But then they put six strings in my hands

Now I had a weapon which I could wield

To fight against the evil parts of me

And it didn't take too long

For me to find a way

To the place where I could escape from all of the pain

A new dimension where I was in control

Directing everything, how my story will go


Verse 2.

Oh I remember all those nights

That I spent alone with my guitar

Telling her how life got me down

And from all those words I made my songs

About my life, my fears and hopes

Expressing what I really feel inside

Snaga

Đumi

Lyrics: Đumi

ocals: Đumi

Music: Đumi

Arrangement: Đumi

Mix/Master: Đumi

Lyrics:

Verse 1.

Pao sam, posumnjao u Tvoj plan za mene

Oslijepio sam, ne vidim Tvoja djela oko sebe

Ne cujem Tvoj glas, a mozda ga ni ne zelim cut

Jer bojim se pogledat sebe i priznat sve grijehe sto ucinih protiv Tebe

Verse 2.

Molim za oprost,

zelim Te u srcu svom

Pomozi mi vratit se na put za vjecni dom

Skini te ljuske sa mojih ociju

Utisaj oluju da, cujem Tvoj glas u moru


Chorus.

Nasao sam svoju snagu na koljenima ispod kriza Tvog

U trenutku kada pomislih da sam dotako dno

Tada si me podigao

Ti si mi pomogo nadjacati svu tamu u meni

Zbog Tebe sada imam zivot koji vrijedi zivjeti


Verse 3.

Sad vidim da ne mogu,

bez Tebe u svom zivotu

Spreman sam priznati da nisam se trudio

Ali zelim se vratiti,

k Tebi u Tvoj zagrljaj

I biti Tvoj ucenik,

slavit zivot Tvoj


Bridge.

Daj mi snage da se drzim puta Tvog

Da zivim zivot kakav Ti si za mene namjenio

Salji mi poruke, ja obecajem da slusat cu Tvoj glas

Vise se ne bojim, znam da u Tebi je moj spas

Proud

D'Dario

Lyrics: D'Dario

Vocals: D'Dario

Music: D'Dario

Arrangement: D'Dario

Mix/Master: D'Dario

Lyrics:

Verse 1.

I'm not good at telling people how I feel.

And these words right now, they're hard for me to sing.

But I need to say, what's bothering me.

Cause I can't keep it inside it's overwhelming.

Chorus.

Even though I have you,

even though you're there.

I can't help but to feel alone.

No matter what I do or say it always seems to be wrong.

I need you to tell me, yeah I need you to see.

That you don't need to do much

just say that you're proud of me


Verse 2.

I know its hard for you,

just as it is for me.

To let somebody in,

to show them how you feel.

They say that you love me,

more than anyone else.

And I wanna belive them

but I need to hear it for myself.

By My Side

D'Dario

Lyrics: D'Dario

Vocals: D'Dario

Music: D'Dario

Arrangement: D'Dario

Mix/Master: D'Dario

Lyrics:

Verse 1.

Look up at the sky you'll see stars shining bright,

in the dark, lighting up the night

And every night that you look up I'll be there with you in my mind

holding tight making every second count

So when you feel that you're alone and I'm miles from home, don't be sad,

just know I'm coming back

Pre-chorus.

To you, I will come back to you


Chorus.

Because where ever you are

that's where my home is right now

And there's nothing in this life

that could keep us apart

no more

I wish I could freeze this moment in time

And make you forever mine

So that from now on and until I die

You're there by my side


Verse 2.

Can you see that with you around

I'm a better man it's a better life a better time to be alive

And I could stand here for hours just looking at you smile

while your eyes keep shining like the stars

Cause every second that I'm with you

makes me feel like I can do almost anything

this feels like a dream come


Pre-chorus 2.

True, and I'll never let go of you

Vjerujem

Đumi

Lyrics: Đumi

Vocals: Đumi i Lucija Šimunić

Music: Đumi & Dominik Smolec (Guitar)

Arrangement: Đumi

Mix/Master: Đumi

Lyrics:

Verse 1.

Kada osjećam da sam sam na ovome svijetu,

tada vraćam se Tebi jer Ti si moj dom.

I kada nemam snage da nastavim svoj put,

tad olakšaš mi korak, pružiš mi potporu.

Pre-chorus 1.

Ima dana kada osjećam se slab.

Napušten, odbačen, od svijeta odrezan.

U te dane ja kleknem pred Tebe,

da mi pokažeš put stvoren za mene.


Chorus.

Ja vjerujem, makar ne vidim Te sad.

Vjerujem u Tvoje milosrđe, u Tvoju ljubav bez granica.

Ja vjerujem, iako ne čujem Tvoj glas.

Vjerujem u Tvoju beskrajnu mudrost,

u Tvoj plan za sve nas.

Ja vjerujem...

(Aleluja, aleluja)


Verse 2.

Znam da nisam namijenjen vidjet Tvoje lice očima,

to lice čiji sjaj može oslijepit svakog čovjeka.

Znam da nisam namijenjen ćuti Tvoj glas,

taj glas koji me vodi, koji moli za moj spas.


Pre-chorus 2.

I čak, kada svi oko mene ne žele Te primiti.

Prihvatit Tvoju ljubav, oproštenje, srce Ti otvoriti.

Kada ja zajedno njima ne vidim promjenu i tada,

ja ću svjedočiti o snazi u Tvom imenu.

Spreman sam

Đumi

Lyrics: Đumi

Vocals: Đumi

Music: Đumi

Arrangement: Đumi

Mix/Master: Đumi

Lyrics:

Intro.

Spreman sam, čuo sam poziv Tvoj.

Otvaram Ti vrata, uđi u hram moj.

I nikad ne izađi, zauvijek ostani,

samnom u mojoj molitvi.

Build. Ale, ale, ale, aleluja,

ale, ale, ale, aleluja,

ale, ale, ale, aleluja.

Ale, ale, ale, aleluja,

ale, ale, ale, aleluja,

ale, ale, ale, aleluuja.


Verse 1.

Gdje god da pođem Ti si tu,

sa mnom uvijek u duhu.

Duh Sveti zapalio me je,

sad kličem Njegovo ime.


Chorus.

Isuse, Tvoja ljubav nema granice.

Po Tvojoj krvi moj grijeh otkupljen je.

Isuse, sada znam svoj put,

odlučio sam se,

da budem vojnik Tvoj,

spreman za križ svoj.


Verse 2.

Sad stojim ovdje, proričem o Tvojim djelima.

To milosrđe koje želiš dati svim ljudima.

Podigni ruke, povisi svoj glas, neka te Duh oblije.

Zajedno sa svim Svetima kliči Njegovo ime
